description:
Vovsoft Filename Lister is an easy to use file listing software that can list and export folder structures. It gives you the possibility to choose any drive or directory in order to list all containing files, folders or both.

Vovsoft Filename Lister is an easy to use file listing software that can list and export folder structures. It gives you the possibility to choose any drive or directory in order to list all containing files, folders or both. There are also exporting options available, in case you want to not just view the listed items but also save this information to file.

Following a fast and speedy setup operation that should not give you any trouble, you're welcomed by a simple window with a plain and simple interface, where you can get started by choosing a drive or directory to scan. If you are looking for a file lister tool, this utility will come in handy.

This software supports very long path and file names (longer than 260 characters). It can display filename length, file or folder size, and last modified date.

Key Features
* Sort by filename or filesize
* Filter files
* Case-sensitive or case-insensitive filtering
* Include subfolders
* Copy as path
* Show file icons
* Hide initial path
* Hide file extension
* Export to TXT file
* Export to HTML, CSV, XLS, XLSX file
